FuncDef: This command configures primary IPv4 or IPv6 destination address for the sFlow agent to send sFlow datagrams to. Optionally a destination port can also be configured (by default port 6343 is used).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 or IPv6 address to send the sFlow datagrams. Values-a.b.c.d|(IPv4), x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x|(IPv6), [x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x]|(IPv6), x - [0..FFFF]H.
Specifies the UDP destination port to send the sFlow datagrams. Values-1 to 65535.
